sentences.sContent: I think I am a coward, a recreant and a fool. Even now I don't know how to react when he shows me his eyes and grin.
sentences.sContent_eng: I think I am a coward, a recreant and a fool. Even now I don't know how to react when he shows me his eyes and grin.
sentences.sCn: 我觉得自己是个懦夫、叛徒、白痴。直到现在我也不知道要在他向我展示他的双眸和微笑时如何反应。
